TankWarGame

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • TankWarGame.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BulletBar, EnergyBar, Explosive, GameItem, LifeBar, MoveableObject, Wall, WarField

    public abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    所有遊戲物件最高父類別，內含基本的欄位以及方法
    Author:
    Yi Tseng
